Uses of Interface
designPatterns.Observer

  • Packages that use Observer 
    Package Description
    designPatterns  
    view  

    • Uses of Observer in designPatterns

      Fields in designPatterns with type parameters of type Observer 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Set<Observer> Subject.observers 
      Methods in designPatterns with parameters of type Observer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Subject.attach(Observer observer)
      This methods allows an observer to register with the subject for update notifications when the subject changes.
      void Subject.detach(Observer observer)
      This methods allows an observer to unregister from the subject again.

    • Uses of Observer in view

      Classes in view that implement Observer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  View
      This class implements a view on the Monopoly game based on the original Matador GUI; it serves as a kind of adapter to the Matador GUI.
